game.name: Freefall '95
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Fast paced, arcade-like, 90’s inspired action packed fun! Play as a passenger on board a doomed flight stuck in a twisted time loop in the year 1995. Explore a wild time-bending narrative while stacking up trick combos, collecting items, earning coins, upgrading abilities and dodging debris!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fast paced, arcade-like, 90’s inspired action packed fun! Play as a passenger on board a doomed flight stuck in a twisted time loop in the year 1995. Explore a wild time-bending narrative while stacking up trick combos, collecting items, earning coins, upgrading abilities and dodging debris!
